name: SABnzbd
description: Ensures the SABnzbd container is running and API responds on port 8080.
check_cmd: if command -v docker >/dev/null 2>&1; then if docker ps --format '{{.Names}}' | grep -q '^sabnzbd$'; then echo ok; else echo fix; fi; else echo ok; fi
fix_cmd: if command -v docker >/dev/null 2>&1; then docker start sabnzbd 2>/dev/null || docker restart sabnzbd 2>/dev/null || true; fi
verify_cmd: sleep 5; if curl -fs --max-time 5 http://localhost:8080/api?mode=version 2>/dev/null | grep -qE '[0-9]+\.[0-9]+'; then echo ok; else echo fail; fi
